title: Herb & Crystal Infusions with Annie Wilson
description: Herb & Crystal Infusions with Annie Wilson Hosted By Fox Haven Farm & Retreat Center. Event starts on Tuesday, 3 October 2023 and happening at Fox Haven Organic Farm & Learning Center, Jefferson, MD. Register or Buy Tickets, Price information.
cleaned_text: Tue Oct 03 2023 at 06:30 pm to 07:30 pm (GMT-04:00) Fox Haven Organic Farm & Learning Center, 3630 Poffenberger Rd., Jefferson, United States Have you ever been curious about the benefits of crystals--iron, sulfur, copper content, and all? In this introductory lesson, we'll demystify the hard facts about minerals, and explore their use as an energetic pairing with herbals. Meet your teacher Annie is a mineral nerd and an herbal student. She can be found outside foraging for mushrooms and crystals, making art, or working at the herb shop. She grew up in the woods camping and looking for crystals, and can't wait to share the wonder of it with you. You may also like the following [events from Fox Haven Farm & Retreat Center](https://allevents.in/org/fox-haven-farm-and-retreat-center/4206365): Tickets for Herb & Crystal Infusions with Annie Wilson can be booked here. |Ticket Information||Ticket Price| |General Admission||USD 15| Stay tuned with the most relevant events happening around you. Attend, Share & Influence! E.g. Jack is first name and Mandanka is last name.
